TipArcaneResist:
{c_label}Arcane Resistance: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces Arcane damage from Level {c_number}{s2}{/c_number} enemies by {c_number}{s3}{/c_number}.
TipArcaneResistBonus:
{c_label}Arcane Resistance: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces Arcane damage from Level {c_number}{s2}{/c_number} enemies by {c_number}{s3} + {s4}{/c_number}.
TipArmor:
{c_label}Armor: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} The total Armor granted by all of your equipped items.
{icon:bullet} Reduces Physical damage taken from enemies of equal Level by {c_number}{s2}{/c_number}.
{icon:bullet} Non-Physical damage taken is reduced according to your Armor Contribution.
TipBlockAmount:
{c_label}Shield Block Value: {c_number}{s1} - {s2}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} The amount of damage prevented whenever an attack is blocked.
TipColdResist:
{c_label}Cold Resistance: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces Cold damage from Level {c_number}{s2}{/c_number} enemies by {c_number}{s3}{/c_number}.
TipColdResistBonus:
{c_label}Cold Resistance: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces Cold damage from Level {c_number}{s2}{/c_number} enemies by {c_number}{s3} + {s4}{/c_number}.
TipCraftingMats:
[PH] {c_label}Crafting Materials: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} The total amount of crafting materials in your inventory.
TipDamageReduction:
{c_label}Damage Reduction{/c}
{icon:bullet} All incoming damage reduced by: {c_number}{s1}{/c}
TipDefenseRating:
{c_label}Defense: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Items grant you defense, which decreases damage taken.
TipEnchantressArmor:
{c_label}Armor: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces all damage from enemies of the same Level by {c_number}{s3}{/c_number}.
TipExperienceNext:
{c_label}To Next: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} The amount of experience needed to reach your next Level.
TipFireResist:

TipFireResistBonus:
{c_label}Fire Resistance: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}

TipHealing:
{c_label}Healing: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} The amount of Life you can recover every second in combat.
{icon:bullet} Healing is based on your Life per Hit, Life per Second, Life Steal,
    Life per Fury/Spirit Spent, Life per Kill, and Health Globe Healing Bonus.
TipItemPower:
{c_label}ItemPower: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Items grant you power, which increases damage dealt and decreases damage taken.

{c_label}Toughness: {c_number}{s1}{/c_number}{/c}
{icon:bullet} The total amount of raw damage you can take.

    average resistances, and missile, melee, and elite damage reduction.
